about_the_game:
Lucky Realtor is a clicker Game, Tap, collect, and equip! Endless fun with a simple tap. Tap, tap, tap your way to cooler skins! The more you tap, the faster you'll unlock new and unique rooms. Depending on your click count, get up to 3 random rooms every 3 hours.

3 hour drop pool chances*:

  • Common - 50%

  • Uncommon - 38%

  • Rare - 12%

  • Epic - 1 in 2 000 000

  • Legendary - 1 in 15 000 000

* Subject to change

Features:

Rooms!

Step into a world of discovery and exploration where every room offers a new experience! Our game features a diverse array of uniquely designed rooms, each with its own atmosphere and story to tell. From futuristic sci-fi rooms with glowing panels and high-tech interfaces, to ancient, dusty rooms filled with relics of the past, every room is crafted to immerse you in a different world.

name: Lucky Realtor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 5500 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 5500 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X +
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Lucky Realtor is a clicker Game, Tap, collect, and equip! Endless fun with a simple tap. Tap, tap, tap your way to cooler skins! The more you tap, the faster you'll unlock new and unique rooms. Download now and start tapping!
